name: Lil Chug's Milk Errand
description:
MILK ERRAND - A WILD COOKIE CHASE🥛🍪
The pesky bugs have infested the house! Help Lil Chugs collect cookies and avoid the bugs along the way as you make your way to the portal of Cooltopia! Make it before the time runs out! ⏰

Here's a pixel 2D platformer inspired by the almighty Lil Chugs the incredible Cool Cats NFT Community. Developed this game over the span of a week by myself, amidst university commitments and internship deliverables. Wanted to create a unique, lovable experience as part of the upcoming gamified metaverse, Cooltopia, and gave the little guy the main character role to run the show! WLTC, WLTP, and We absolutely love the $MILK too!

Not a Cool Cats/Pets Holder, but I really wish to become one someday 💙  

PS: All rights go to Cool Cats NFT. No copyright infringement intended. This is a passion project that does not profit over its usage. Apart from the likeness of Lil Chugs and the sprites used to represent health, I designed, developed, and scripted all assets, animations, and game mechanics of the minigame myself unless otherwise mentioned. Join the Cool Cats Community on Discord here! 

CONTROLS:

WASD - Up, Left, Down, Right respectively (You may use arrow keys too)

SPACE - Jump
